Principiante.title: Linear Regression Implementation
Principiante.description: Implement linear regression from scratch using NumPy. Learn the mathematical foundations and code the algorithm step by step.

Intermedio.title: Logistic Regression Implementation
Intermedio.description: Implement logistic regression from scratch using NumPy. Learn the mathematical foundations and code the algorithm step by step.

Intermedio.title: Decision Tree Implementation
Intermedio.description: Implement a decision tree from scratch using NumPy. Learn the mathematical foundations and code the algorithm step by step.

Avanzato.title: Transformer Architecture
Avanzato.description: Implement the Transformer model for NLP tasks with multi-head attention, positional encoding, and layer normalization.

Avanzato.title: Generative Adversarial Networks
Avanzato.description: Build a GAN from scratch to generate synthetic images, understanding the adversarial training process.

Avanzato.title: Deep Q-Network (DQN)
Avanzato.description: Implement a Deep Q-Network agent to solve classic control problems using reinforcement learning.

Avanzato.title: Convolutional Neural Networks
Avanzato.description: Build a CNN architecture for image classification with convolution, pooling, and batch normalization layers.

Avanzato.description: Implement a Deep Q-Network agent to solve classic control problems using reinforcement learning.
